pullrequest.title: Initial support for testing. rosapi checks

content.raw:
Right, roslaunch won't let you pass an arg to a launch file that isn't expecting it.  I would do one of two things:

1. remove the arg from here and from the outer `.test` file that includes this one (and thus rely on the default of `gzserver` that's in `vrc_final.launch`); or
1. keep the arg, and go ahead and pass it through to the `vrc_final.launch` file.

Either way works for me.
content.html:
Right, roslaunch won't let you pass an arg to a launch file that isn't expecting it. I would do one of two things:

  1. remove the arg from here and from the outer .test file that includes this one (and thus rely on the default of gzserver that's in vrc_final.launch); or
  2. keep the arg, and go ahead and pass it through to the vrc_final.launch file.

Either way works for me.
